channel.title: highscores[317][Delta]
channel.description:
i tried adding hiscores using the tut on mopar :rolleyes:
but i get this error when i start up the server:
[code]java.sql.SQLException: null, message from server: "Host 'FT-6285' is not allowe d to connect to this MySQL server" at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.java:946) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.doHandshake(MysqlIO.java:1053) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2743) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at SQL.createConnection(SQL.java:14) at server.run(server.java:273) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
i also get huge errors when players log out and the hiscore page wont work correctly, you can take a look at it yourself: [url=http://godspks.no-ip.info/highscores/highscores.php]http://godspks.no-ip.info/highscores/highscores.php[/url]
i think that somehow, my VPS aint allowed to connect to the MySQL server... idk why =\

item.title: highscores[317][Delta]
item.dc:creator: @skander1345 skander1345
item.description:
@skander1345 wrote:

hm, then … i simply don’t know…

item.title: highscores[317][Delta]
item.dc:creator: @jailed jailed
item.description:
@jailed wrote:

[quote=“skander1345, post:2, topic:369346”]read the tut again and see if theres any errors on what you have done… seems like an undone step OR a connection problem from the server to mysql…
try posting on the tut’s thread…[/quote]

i’ve read over it, and i dont think i missed anything.
and i also posted on the thread before i posted this topic

item.title: highscores[317][Delta]
item.dc:creator: @jailed jailed
item.description:
@jailed wrote:

i tried adding hiscores using the tut on mopar :rolleyes:

but i get this error when i start up the server:

java.sql.SQLException: null, message from server: "Host 'FT-6285' is not allowe d to connect to this MySQL server" at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.java:946) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.doHandshake(MysqlIO.java:1053) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2743) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at SQL.createConnection(SQL.java:14) at server.run(server.java:273) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

i also get huge errors when players log out and the hiscore page wont work correctly, you can take a look at it yourself: http://godspks.no-ip.info/highscores/highscores.php
